message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.HC 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as the paper deals with the interaction between gesture and language in generating referring expressions. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is also likely as the paper discusses the use of computational models to predict viewer judgment of referring expressions. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is relevant as the paper mentions training better models for predicting viewer judgment. 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision) is a possibility as the paper may involve analyzing visual cues in gesture. 
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is also possible as the paper discusses the effectiveness of referring expressions in conveying information to human viewers.
